cards.details:
- Aclarar el "show, don't tell": https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Show,_don%27t_tell
- Me "paro" mucho a describir la distribución del pasillo y las dos grandes salas de la planta 26 a pesar de que se está produciendo una avanzadilla de los ingleses (¡acción!).
- Muchos personajes.
- Sin pausa.

cards.name: Agradecer al "Snowflake guy"
Análisis semana / planificación (DESC)
cards.details:
1. Asegurar que estamos en rama correcta.
2. Exportar kanban y añadir a Git.
3. Escribir entrada diario semanal (+ commit).

4. Mejora continua.
    - Repasar documento de consejos de escritura.
    - No perder tiempo en pensar nombres desde el principio.
    - Por objetivos mejor si soy capaz de asegurar un ritmo constante. Por tiempo si estoy con objetivos indeterminados / más "creativos".
5. Planificación de la semana que viene.
6. Meter en Tasks si será por objetivos o tiempo.
7. Devolver esta tarea a ToDo.

cards.name: Clasificar personajes principales, secundarios y terciarios (DESC)
cards.details:
Referencias

- https://www.writerscookbook.com/character-types-story/

Ron and Hermione from Harry Potter are good examples of secondary characters. They’re three-dimensional, but it’s clear that the story doesn’t revolve around them. They’ll do anything they can to help the Harry, though.

Subplots often revolve around secondary characters, such as Hermione’s creation of S.P.E.W..

---

They’re not central to the story, and they’re not along for the ride. They may, however, play a crucial role in a part of the protagonist’s journey, such as Lupin teaching Harry about dementors.

- https://gointothestory.blcklst.com/three-levels-of-characters-primary-secondary-tertiary-379b6fa05706

Primary: The main characters.
Secondary: Recurring characters who are of lesser importance.
Tertiary: Characters who appear in one, perhaps two scenes for a specific, limited purpose.

As a way of helping a reader distinguish Primary and Secondary characters, I use last names for the latter. If I don’t need to establish a significant level of intimacy with a character who will only be around for a few scenes or a minor subplot, why waste a first name on them?

- ¿Otros?

cards.details:
Web: "To force Manukript to store chapters as folders and scenes as text files in your computer's file system, de-select the general setting Save to one single file check box. This can be useful to enable editing the scene text files with a different text editor, or the use of a revision control system like git. Be sure to not have Manuskript open at the same time otherwise conflicts can arise."

- COMPROBAR que se guarda todo (fichas de personajes y demás incluido).
